participant_1.background:
I have two personalities, one that is nice to my family and one that is not so nice to others.
I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time!
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.
my grandma raised me.
I am slightly overweight due to my erratic eating habits.

My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them.
I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love.
i only wear tennis shoes.
I'm a musician who recently became truthful with my coach
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.

content.text: Hello! I'm a good mother but I have a second personality that is not so nice to others. Do you have any children?
Hello! I don't have children, but I have a new love interest and we are always up for going to the movies together.
What do you do for a living?
I am a musician and I recently became truthful with my coach about my eye contact issues.
I'm glad you were able to be truthful with your coach. I'm a little overweight due to erratic eating habits, but I love wearing my favorite color sneakers.
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like. I only wear tennis shoes.
That's great that you don't care what your father thinks. My grandma raised me and I'm always trying to be a better person for her.
That's so sweet of you! I'm sure your grandma is very proud of you.
